ht32_time_conf.h

00001 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00002  * @file    ht32_time_conf.h
00003  * @version $Rev:: 6752         $
00004  * @date    $Date:: 2023-03-02 #$
00005  * @brief   The configuration of HT32 Time function.
00006  *************************************************************************************************************
00007  * @attention
00008  *
00009  * Firmware Disclaimer Information
00010  *

00027 //-------- <<< Use Configuration Wizard in Context Menu >>> -----------------
00028 
00029 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00030 #ifndef __HT32_TIME_CONF_H
00031 #define __HT32_TIME_CONF_H
00032 
00033 #ifdef __cplusplus
00034  extern "C" {
00035 #endif
00036 
00037 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00038 /*
00039 //<e0> Enable HT32 Time Function
00040 //  <i> Provide "Time_GetTick()" and "Time_Dealy()" functions.
00041 
00042 //  <o1> Timer Selection
00043 //      <0=> BFTM0
00044 //      <1=> BFTM1
00045 //      <2=> SCTM0
00046 //      <3=> SCTM1
00047 //      <4=> SCTM2
00048 //      <5=> SCTM3
00049 //      <6=> PWM0
00050 //      <7=> PWM1
00051 //      <8=> PWM2
00052 //      <9=> GPTM0
00053 //      <10=> GPTM1
00054 //      <11=> MCTM0
00055 
00056 //  <h> Timer Clock Setting
00057 //  </h>
00058 //    <i> Timer Clock = (Core Clock) / (APB Peripheral Clock Prescaler)
00059 //    <i> HTCFG_TIME_CLKSRC = _HTCFG_TIME_CORECLK / (2^HTCFG_TIME_PCLK_DIV)
00060 //    <i> _HTCFG_TIME_CORECLK = LIBCFG_MAX_SPEED or HTCFG_TIME_CLK_MANUAL (selected by HTCFG_TIME_CLKSEL)
00061 
00062 //  <o2> -- Core Clock Setting (CK_AHB)
00063 //    <i> HTCFG_TIME_CLKSEL
00064 //    <i> 0 = Default Maximum (LIBCFG_MAX_SPEED)
00065 //    <i> 1 = Manual Input (HTCFG_TIME_CLK_MANUAL)
00066 //       <0=> Default Maximum (LIBCFG_MAX_SPEED)
00067 //       <1=> Manual Input (HTCFG_TIME_CLK_MANUAL)
00068 
00069 //  <o3> -- Core Clock Manual Input (Hz)
00070 //    <i> HTCFG_TIME_CLK_MANUAL
00071 //    <i> Only meaningful when Core Clock Setting (HTCFG_TIME_CLKSEL) = Manual Input (1)
00072 
00073 //  <o4> -- APB Peripheral Clock Prescaler
00074 //    <i> HTCFG_TIME_PCLK_DIV
00075 //       <0=> /1
00076 //       <1=> /2
00077 //       <2=> /4
00078 //       <3=> /8
00079 
00080 //  <o5> Time Tick (Hz, not applicable for BFTM) <1-1000000:100>
00081 //    <i> Not applicable for BFTM, fixed TICKHZ to HTCFG_TIME_CLKSRC for BFTM.
00082 */
00083 #if (1) // Enable HT32 Time Function
00084 #define HTCFG_TIME_IPSEL                          (0)
00085 #define HTCFG_TIME_CLKSEL                         (0)         // 0 = Default Maximum (LIBCFG_MAX_SPEED), 1 = Manual Input (HTCFG_TIME_CLKSRC)
00086 #define HTCFG_TIME_CLK_MANUAL                     (20000000)  // Only meaningful when HTCFG_TIME_CLKSEL = 1 (Manual Input)
00087 #define HTCFG_TIME_PCLK_DIV                       (0)         // 0 ~ 3. (/1, /2, /4, /8)
00088 #define HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ                         (1000)      // Hz, not applicable for BFTM, fixed TICKHZ to HTCFG_TIME_CLKSRC for BFTM
00089 #define HTCFG_TIME_MULTIPLE                       (1)         // MUST be 1, 2, 4, 8. TICK = COUNT / MULTIPLE. Not applicable for BFTM.
00090 /*
00091 
00092   Timer Clock = (Core Clock) / (APB Peripheral Clock Prescaler)
00093   HTCFG_TIME_CLKSRC = (_HTCFG_TIME_CORECLK) / (2^HTCFG_TIME_PCLK_DIV)
00094   where _HTCFG_TIME_CORECLK can be LIBCFG_MAX_SPEED or HTCFG_TIME_CLK_MANUAL (selected by HTCFG_TIME_CLKSEL)
00095 
00096   Tick Range: 0 ~ 2^32 / HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ (maximum tick time)
00097   Interrupt Time: _HTCFG_TIME_OVERFLOW_VALUE / (HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ * HTCFG_TIME_MULTIPLE) Second
00098   (Interrupt Time is not applicable for BFTM)
00099 
00100   Example: 32-bit BFTM with 48 MHz Timer Clock
00101     HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ = HTCFG_TIME_CLKSRC = 48000000
00102     Tick Range: 0 ~ 2^32 / 48000000 = 0 ~ 89.478485 Second (maximum tick time, return to 0 every 89.478485 Second)
00103     BFTM do not use interrupt
00104 
00105   Example: 16-bit GPTM with 1 ms tick
00106     HTCFG_TIME_TICKHZ = 1000 (Hz)
00107     HTCFG_TIME_MULTIPLE = 1 (1 Timer Count = 1 Tick)
00108     Tick Range: 0 ~ 2^32 / 1000 = 0 ~ 4294967 Second = 0 ~ 49.7 Day (maximum tick time, return to 0 every 49.7 Day)
00109     Interrupt Time: 65536 / (1000 * 1) = 65.536 Second (Trigger interrupt every 65.536 Second)
00110 */
00111 #endif
00112 /*
00113 //</e>
00114 */
00115 
00116 #ifdef __cplusplus
00117 }
00118 #endif
00119 
00120 #endif
00121
